ï»¿OFICI AL gl q STATJTORY COMMITTEE REPORT TO: The President, Internation al Bank for Reconstruction and Development Report of the Committee under Section 4(iii) of Article III of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Loan (G iizhou Rural Development Project) to the People's Republic of China. The undersigned Commil tee constituted under Section 7 of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of International Bank 'or Reconstruction and Development (the Bank) hereby submits its report pursuant to Section 4(iii of Article III of said Articles in respect of the proposal that the Bank grant to the People's Repub ic of China (the Borrower), a loan in an amount of one hundred million United States Dollars (U.$ 100,000,000). The purpose of said loan is to demonstrate a model for agricultural sector restructuring and modernization, improved organizational arrangements, and strengthened public service delivery in the Project Counties of Guizhou Province. 1. The Committee has caref illy studied the merits of the proposal to grant such a loan, and of the purpose to which the proce ds of the loan are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of th< opinion that the project toward the financing of which the proceeds of such loan are to be pplied comes within the purposes of the Bank as set forth in Article I of said Articles of A Yreement, and that said project is designed to promote the development of the productive facilities and resources of the People's Republic of China and is in the interest of the People's Repub ic of China and of the members of the Bank as a whole.
ï»¿-2- (People's Republic of China) (Guizhou Rural Development Project) 3. Accordingly, the Commit ee finds that said project merits financial assistance from the Bank, and hereby recommends sai J project for such assistance.
